Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.vc

Class HcsVcTopicListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageListener<HcsVcMessage>
      • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.vc.HcsVcTopicListener
  • public class HcsVcTopicListener
extends MessageListener<HcsVcMessage>
    A listener of confirmed HcsVcMessage messages from a VC topic. Messages are received from a given mirror node, parsed and validated.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageListener

        decrypter, errorHandler, filters, ignoreErrors, invalidMessageHandler, query, subscriptionHandle, topicId

    • Constructor Detail

      • HcsVcTopicListener

        public HcsVcTopicListener​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId vcTopicId)
        Creates a new instance of a VC topic listener for the given consensus topic. By default, invalid messages are ignored and errors are not. Listener without a public key provider will not validate message signatures.
        Parameters:
        vcTopicId - The VC consensus topic ID.

      • HcsVcTopicListener

        public HcsVcTopicListener​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId vcTopicId,
                          java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.util.Collection<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PublicKey>> publicKeysProvider)
        Creates a new instance of a VC topic listener for the given consensus topic. By default, invalid messages are ignored and errors are not.
        Parameters:
        vcTopicId - The VC consensus topic ID.
        publicKeysProvider - Provider of a public keys acceptable for a given VC hash.
